author: pietjepuk
content:
(can't post in interop)<@755590043632140352> 
```curl -X GET 127.0.0.1:5052/eth/v1/beacon/states/head/validators -H "accept: application/json" | jq ".data[].validator.withdrawal_credentials[:4]" | sort | uniq -c```

author: potuz
content: Nice thanks! Why aren't you whitelisted on interop? <@&595685821026271242>  can't the `ethtusiast` role be whitelisted?

author: potuz
content: Wait <@397389662085185547> wouldn't `uniq` filter out the execution ones? Ah perhaps you want to count the bls ones? I think it's simpler to grab the first byte and count isn't it?

author: pietjepuk
content: I thought you wanted the counts? It takes the first 4 characters ("0x00" is length 4) and groups them based on that

author: potuz
content: Yeah sorry, didn't know the flag -c for uniq
